class.name: VisualShaderNodeVectorScalarStep
class.brief_description: Calculates a vector Step function within the visual shader graph.
class.description: Translates to [code]step(edge, x)[/code] in the shader language. Returns [code]0.0[/code] if [code]x[/code] is smaller than [code]edge[/code] and [code]1.0[/code] otherwise.
